jobDescription: Description  Buckle up, hit the open road and start making hungry people happy as a delivery driver for Pizza Hut®. That's right, we'll pay you to cruise around in your mobile office your car listening to your own tunes and delivering great pizza and pasta. What more could you want? Independence, good music and great food with tips! Sound good? Requirements Besides your smile, energy and reliable set of wheels, here's what you'll need for this job: Attained 18 years of age, auto insurance for your vehicle, a clean driving record, and the ability to pass a background check.
